alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Southern Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Laurens, southern Spartanburg and west central Union Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Spartanburg, or near Moore, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodruff, Roebuck, Buffalo, Moore, Cross Keys, Pauline, Cross Anchor and Enoree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
